member.name: D3D12_PROTECTED_RESOURCE_SESSION_SUPPORT_FLAGS
member.summary: Defines constants that specify protected resource session support.

member.name: D3D12_PROTECTED_RESOURCE_SESSION_SUPPORT_FLAGS.D3D12_PROTECTED_RESOURCE_SESSION_SUPPORT_FLAG_NONE
member.summary: Indicates that protected resource sessions are not supported.

member.name: D3D12_PROTECTED_RESOURCE_SESSION_SUPPORT_FLAGS.D3D12_PROTECTED_RESOURCE_SESSION_SUPPORT_FLAG_SUPPORTED
member.summary: Indicates that protected resource sessions are supported.
